attr.title: Maccha's World
attr.desc: You find yourself cut off from your family in desperate need of a new liver to save your life. With 100,000 gold coins needed, you enter "The Pit", a cave full of money, monsters and alcohol. Can you make it out in one piece?
attr.inst: Download the game free from itch.io (https://digitalgodtower.itch.io/macchas-world), extract, and copy game files to macchasworld/assets
attr.inst_md: Download the game free from [itch.io](https://digitalgodtower.itch.io/macchas-world), extract, and copy game files to `macchasworld/assets`
